DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted to compare the contrast effect and safety of SH L562BB with ProHance, which has already been approved as a pharmaceutical product of similar indication.
DOC.brief_title: SH L 562BB Phase II/III Dose Justification and Gadoteridol-controlled Comparative Study
DOC.criteria: Japanese patients at least 20 years of age Patients with diagnosed primary cancer Patients with metastatic lesions by CT/MRI Patients who have contraindication to the MRI examinations Patients who have severe renal disorder Patients in extremely serious general condition
